fields:
I got everything you could ever want, need, dream of, I’ve got it all.
(Press Space to Exit the Shop)
By the way, me and old man Beisenburg have a deal going.
We run this scheme where he gives me the test scores and I help him distribute what he “makes.”
Speaking of which, if you ever wanna try it, I’m your man if you have $150 Gos Coins.
If you ever need to go to Beisenberg for help, tell ‘em the secret code :”Mr. Mountain’s Mom”.
